summary: The powers of Serana, added and modified.
descriptionHtml:
For those who found Serana as a follower, rather weak.
Now you will see an increase in power, yet is only the beginning, soon will bring updates ...
Some things she can do now: summon gargoyle, drain life style Harkon (without transformation VL) ... I added it also shout the drain vitality, but have not had time to know if it worked; it does not uses elven dagger, is now Dragonbone dagger.

[size=3][color=red][b]Incompatibility:[/b][/color][/size]
*Never

[size=3][color=red][b]Recommends:[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]
Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]

[size=2][b]My other mod:[/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19942]
Cyrus Delvin Follower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25172]
Benjamin Taylor Follower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25254]
Hestla Merchant Upgrade[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32430]
DRAGONBORN ENB[/url]
author: Kassane23
